subject: Standard RFP document for appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT projects of NHAI.
text: Hrr4 774l4 <TTHT 4faart TnQ Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ta 4aat; 73v 4Raa7 3 TTAT TNrav) T48 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 wTt #T National Highways Authority of India QA, Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Wa 6, 7e7-10, ETaT, 7 fra-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NoNHAI/CMC/IE/ 2011 Date: 05.07.2011 POLICY MATTER TECH (81/2011) Sub: Standard REP_Document_for_Appointment_of_Independent_Engineer _for DBFQT Projects of NHAL Competent  Authority has   approved the enclosed RFP document for Appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT Projects of NHAI for adoption by all Technical Divisions of NHAI with immediate effect: The Standard RFP document issued vide Policy Matter: Tech(67/2010), letter No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated 21.8.2010 stands superseded: The Standard RFP document is also to be adopted in case the RFP for Appointment of IE has been invited by any Technical Division but the submission is yet to be received: This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (R.B.Sinha) General Manager(CMC) Encl: As above To All Officers at HQ/ All ROs/ AlL PIUs/ AlI CMUs for information to: PS to Chairman/ PS to Members Librarian NHAL (x&o Copy
